snippet.title: [c64] Kid Grid (1983)
snippet.description:
Remake of an arcade game "Amidar"

I first tried this with easiest settings and made to 7th level. After that I made a short attempt with hardest settings. You can stop the monsters and gain temporary invulnerability with the stun special. Stuns can be reserved for later use and will stack with the selected amount of stuns received at the beginning of each level.

Develeper: Arti Haroutunian (also responsible for Qbert clone Juice!)
Publisher: Tronix

http://www.lemon64.com/games/details.php?ID=1432
